name: Six nights to die
description:
.
Karen is a girl who works as a waitress in a bar, when her boss Joss returns from a trip to South America, strange things start to happen in the bar. Karen will have to start investigating what is going on, but she can't neglect her job either.

Caracteristicas.


Immersive experience: Atmospheric and photorealistic graphics intensify the horror experience.

Gameplay : The game mixes the gameplay of a walking simulator with a bar simulation game.

Psychological terror: The game will try to trick and scare you.

Six nights to die is a short game that lasts between 60 and 120 minutes.
